AI Description: STAR (Spliced Transcripts Alignment to a Reference) is a RNA-seq read aligner that maps RNA-seq data to a reference genome to identify splice junctions between exons. It is particularly useful for mapping reads that span multiple exons, thereby aiding in the analysis of alternative splicing events.
Core Features: Alignment Of RNA-Seq Reads To A Reference Genome, Identification Of Splice Junctions, Analysis Of Alternative Splicing Events
General Tags: Software, RNA-Seq, Read Aligner, Splice Junctions, Alternative Splicing
